body:
Sorry I have had a lot of discussion posts but I have been getting

great feedback from the avicus community, so I pose this question to you.

What is the best way to earn money fast both on and offline?

Obviously I have heard of getting a job but I am too young but really want some

extra cash.

Cheers, Hudmister14
body_tagged:
Sorry I have had a lot of discussion posts but I have been getting

great feedback from the avicus community, so I pose this question to you.

What is the best way to earn money fast both on and offline?

Obviously I have heard of getting a job but I am too young but really want some

extra cash.

Cheers, Hudmister14
title: Best ways to earn money???

replies.body:
Hudmister,

It's a good thing that you're putting in the effort beforehand to start working on making money, because it will really make the mile in the long run.
So here's what I do to make money, and it takes very little work, just plenty of studying and research.
With a parent or guardian, you can set up your own way to invest in stocks, or shares of companies. Normally, your parent or guardian will have a decent understanding of the stock market, and investing in stocks would be a fantastic way for you to make money, and a great learning experience.
replies.body_tagged:
Hudmister,

It's a good thing that you're putting in the effort beforehand to start working on making money, because it will really make the mile in the long run.

With a parent or guardian, you can set up your own way to invest in stocks, or shares of companies. Normally, your parent or guardian will have a decent understanding of the stock market, and investing in stocks would be a fantastic way for you to make money, and a great learning experience.

replies.body: Yesssss! That's what I do! @OP look into a Roth IRA. This will keep your money that you got from investing tax free until you take it out in retirement! But for right now, try walking dogs, or shoveling snow (winter), or raking leaves! That will give you a base.

I hope I helped!

replies.body:
Costco sells iPhone 6 16gb for like $20.00 usd, if you sell it for around $40, that's a nice profit and a good deal for the people who sell it to you since they'll get it for around $160 lower than the normal price.

What most people want:
1. iPhones and other smartphones
2. New video games
3. iTunes gift cards
4. Clothes/shoes (I don't know where to get this cheaply but I know you can sell it)
5. Snacks (I only sell food at school because everyone wants food)

www.costco.com/electronics.html

replies.body:
I don't think the US site ships to Australia, but Australia Costco has the same things I'd assume, but you need a membership to actually shop and it only has 7 locations so unless you live near the locations, use ebay or google shopping or maybe gumtree, which all have cheap things compared to what you usually get.

Costco Locations: http://www.costco.com.au/Common/ContactUs.shtml
Gumtree: http://www.gumtree.com.au/s-phones/iphone+6/k0c18313
Google: https://www.google.com.au/search?q=iphone+6
